description:
Order your Four Sigmatic Mushroom Elixirs for 15% off at foursigmatic.com/sahara Tero is such a fun-gi! Ok I'll hold back on the mushroom jokes. If you've haven't heard of medicinal mushrooms yet, you are in for a real treat. They have countless health benefits from healing adrenals to increasing energy to reducing stress to fighting inflammation to balancing hormones and everything in between.

In this episode, we discuss: 1. What medicinal mushrooms are 2. Why Tero created Four Sigmatic to make mushroom consumption easier for people 3. How each mushroom has different benefits 4. If people with Candida can consume mushrooms (the answer is YES and he explaisn why) 5. Why mix mushrooms + coffee? 6. How to make the most out of your mushrooms And so much more!
